title: Dennis J. Matthews Excellence in Physical Medicine & Rehabilitation Fund
description: To support the annual lecture series and promote excellence in rehabilitation by developing new programs, promoting special education, and purchasing specialized equipment. If $25K is reached within five years, gifts will be invested as a pure endowment.
marketingContent: To support the annual lecture series and promote excellence in rehabilitation by developing new programs, promoting special education, and purchasing specialized equipment. If $25K is reached within five years, gifts will be invested as a pure endowment.
